Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR PRESENT GRADE*  1. SECOND LIEUTENANT 2. FIRST LIEUTENANT 3. CAPTAIN 4. MAJOR 0. NO ANSWER

Q.2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN ON ACTIVE SERVICE AS A COMMISSIONED OFFICER IN THE ARMY*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.3A. HAVE YOU SERVED OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES IN THIS WAR*  1. YES, AS AN ENLISTED MAN 2. YES, AS AN OFFICER 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.3B. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR*  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.4. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 YEARS 04. 21 YEARS 05. 22 YEARS 06. 23 YEARS 07. 24 YEARS 08. 25 YEARS 09. 26 THRU 29 10. 30 THRU 34 11. 35 AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

Q.5. HOW MUCH EDUCATION HAVE YOU HAD*  1. LESS THAN 8TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. GRADUATE STUDY IN COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

Q.6. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED OR WIDOWED* F. IF MARRIED:  Q.7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY*  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 6. MARRIED, NO ANSWER AS TO WHEN 0. NO ANSWER
Q.8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE*  1. HAVE NO CHILDREN 2. HAVE ONE CHILD 3. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 4. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 5. I,M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.9. IS YOUR WIFE NOW EXPECTING A BABY*  1. I,M NOT MARRIED 2. YES 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.10. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW*  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
Q.11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT UNIT (COMPANY, BATTERY, TROOP OR SQUADRON)*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER

Q.12. HOW DID YOU RECEIVE YOUR COMMISSION*  1. FROM PILOT-NAVIGATOR-BOMBARDIER TRAINING 2. FROM AIR CORPS TECHNICAL SCHOOL 3. FROM OFFICER CANDIDATE SCHOOL 4. FROM R.O.T.C. OR C.M.T.C. 5. FROM WEST POINT 6. IN SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER

Q.13. HOW MUCH ACTIVE SERVICE DID YOU SEE AS AN ENLISTED MAN BEFORE YOU RECEIVED YOUR COMMISSION*  1. NEVER SERVED AS AN ENLISTED MAN 2. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 3. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 4. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 5. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 6. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 7. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 14 NOT CODED.
Q.15. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN THE WORK YOU ARE DOING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT*  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.16. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY ASSIGNMENT*  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. DISSATISFIED 5. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.17. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY ASSIGNMENT IF GIVEN A CHANCE*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.18. IF YOU HAD A CHANCE TO CHOOSE, WOULD YOU RATHER BE A LINE OFFICER OR A STAFF OFFICER*  1. RATHER BE A STAFF OFFICER 2. RATHER BE A LINE OFFICER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.19. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY ASSIGNMENT WHERE YOU BEST FIT*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.20. DO YOU THINK YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT GIVES YOU A FAIR CHANCE OF PROMOTION*  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON,T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
Q.21. HOW MUCH OF YOUR DUTY TIME IS USED IN DOING THINGS THAT DO NOT SEEM IMPORTANT TO YOU*  1. A LOT OF IT 2. SOME OF IT 3. ONLY A LITTLE OF IT 4. NONE OF IT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.22. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN DO*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.23. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS AN OFFICER IN THE ARMY OR AS A CIVILIAN ENGAGED IN ESSENTIAL WAR WORK*  1. MORE AS A CIVILIAN ENGAGED IN ESSENTIAL WAR WORK 2. MORE AS AN OFFICER IN THE ARMY 3. NO DIFFERENCE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 24 AND 25 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

Q.24. GRANTING THAT ALL OF THE ARMS AND SERVICES ARE NECESSARY, CHECK THE THREE WHICH YOU THINK ARE THE MOST IMPORTANT IN WINNING THE WAR.  Q.25. NOW ON THIS LIST OF ARMS AND SERVICES, CHECK THE THREE WHICH YOU THINK ARE THE LEAST IMPORTANT IN WINNING THE WAR. E. CODES 1-4 ARE USED IF 3 ARE CHECKED IN BOTH Q.24 AND 25. CODES 5-8 ARE USED IF LESS THAN 3 ARE CHECKED IN EITHER OR BOTH Q.24 AND 25. Q.24 AND Q.25 MUST BE COMPARED WITH ANSWER GIVEN IN Q.10.  1. OWN BRANCH CHECKED IN Q.24 BUT NOT IN Q.25 2. OWN BRANCH NOT CHECKED IN Q.24, BUT CHECKED IN Q.25 3. OWN BRANCH CHECKED IN BOTH Q.24 AND Q.25 4. OWN BRANCH NOT CHECKED IN Q.24 AND NOT CHECKED IN Q.25 5. OWN BRANCH CHECKED IN Q.24 BUT NOT IN Q.25 6. OWN BRANCH NOT CHECKED IN Q.24 BUT CHECKED IN Q.25 7. OWN BRANCH CHECKED IN BOTH Q.24 AND Q.25 8. OWN BRANCH NOT CHECKED IN EITHER Q.24 OR Q.25 0. NO ANSWER
Q.26. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NOT*  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27. DO YOU CONSIDER YOUR OWN PRESENT JOB OR DUTY IN THE ARMY AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFORT*  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.28. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU THINK THE TYPE OF WORK DONE BY YOUR OUTFIT IS IN WINNING THE WAR*  1. IT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT TYPE OF WORK 2. IT IS ONE OF THE MORE IMPORTANT TYPES OF WORK 3. IT IS ONE OF THE LESS IMPORTANT TYPES OF WORK 4. IT IS THE LEAST IMPORTANT TYPE OF WORK 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.29. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW IMPORTANT IS THE JOB OF YOUR ARM OR SERVICE IN WINNING THE WAR*  1. IT HAS THE MOST IMPORTANT JOB 2. IT HAS ONE OF THE MORE IMPORTANT JOBS 3. IT HAS ONE OF THE LESS IMPORTANT JOBS 4. IT HAS THE LEAST IMPORTANT JOB 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.30. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR REGIMENT* (IF YOU ARE NOT PART OF A REGIMENT, ANSWER THIS QUESTION FOR THE LARGEST UNIT TO WHICH YOU BELONG.)  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.31. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.32. DO THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP) COOPERATE AND WORK WELL TOGETHER*  1. ALL OF THE TIME 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. OFTEN DO NOT 4. ALMOST NEVER DO 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.33. HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP) WOULD YOU SAY ARE GOOD ALL-AROUND SOLDIERS*  1. ALL ARE 2. MOST ARE 3. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 4. ONLY A FEW ARE 5. ALMOST NONE ARE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.34. HOW DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP) WOULD SHOW UP UNDER COMBAT CONDITIONS*  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT SO WELL 4. POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.35. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU THINK IT IS THAT MEN OBEY WITHOUT QUESTION EVERY ORDER THAT IS GIVEN*  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.36. HOW DO YOU THINK MOST OF THE NONCOMS WHO NOW SERVE WITH YOU COMPARE WITH THE AVERAGE RUN OF NONCOMS IN OTHER OUTFITS THAT YOU KNOW ABOUT*  1. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE MUCH BETTER 2. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE SOMEWHAT BETTER 3. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE ABOUT AVERAGE 4. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE NOT QUITE AS GOOD 5. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE WORSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.37. HOW MUCH SUPERVISION IN THE CONDUCT OF YOUR JOB DO YOU RECEIVE FROM YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICERS*  1. TOO MUCH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. TOO LITTLE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.38. DURING YOUR OFF-DUTY HOURS, HOW OFTEN DO YOU WORK ON IDEAS OR PLANS FOR IMPROVING YOUR OUTFIT*  1. VERY OFTEN 2. FAIRLY OFTEN 3. ONCE IN A WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.39A. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE SOME GOOD SUGGESTIONS ABOUT HOW THINGS IN YOUR OUTFIT COULD BE DONE BETTER OR EASIER*  1. I HAVE A GOOD MANY SUGGESTIONS 2. I HAVE A FEW SUGGESTIONS 3. I HAVE NO SUGGESTIONS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.39B. IF YOU WERE TO MAKE SUGGESTIONS HOW DO YOU THINK THEY WOULD BE RECEIVED BY THOSE WHO COULD PUT THEM TO USE*  1. MY SUGGESTIONS WOULD BE GIVEN NO CONSIDERATION WHATEVER 2. MY SUGGESTIONS WOULD BE GIVEN LITTLE CONSIDERATION 3. MY SUGGESTIONS WOULD BE GIVEN CAREFUL CONSIDERATION 0. NO ANSWER

Q.40. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICERS RECOGNIZE YOUR ABILITIES AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO DO*  1. YES, I,M SURE THEY DO 2. YES, I THINK THEY DO BUT I,M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON,T THINK THEY DO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.41. HOW MUCH DOES IT BOTHER YOU WHEN YOU ARE ORDERED TO DO THINGS WHICH YOU DON,T SEE A GOOD REASON FOR DOING*  1. BOTHERS ME A GREAT DEAL 2. BOTHERS ME QUITE A BIT 3. DOESN,T BOTHER ME MUCH 4. DOESN,T BOTHER ME AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
Q.42. DO TOO MANY OF THE ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS SEEM USELESS TO YOU*  1. NO, I NEVER THOUGHT SO 2. NO, I USED TO THINK SO, BUT DON,T NOW 3. YES, TOO MANY SEEM USELESS 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.43. HOW OFTEN ARE YOU IN SITUATIONS WHICH YOU FEEL COULD BE HANDLED MORE EFFECTIVELY BY DOING SOMETHING TECHNICALLY CONTRARY TO REGULATIONS*  1. FREQUENTLY 2. OCCASIONALLY 3. SELDOM 4. NEVER
Q.44. HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU DONE SOMETHING TECHNICALLY CONTRARY TO REGULATIONS IN ORDER TO HANDLE A SITUATION MORE EFFECTIVELY*  1. FREQUENTLY 2. OCCASIONALLY 3. SELDOM 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
Q.45. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS RUN*  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN PRETTY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.46. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN, DO YOU THINK PROMOTIONS USUALLY GO TO THE OFFICERS WHO DESERVE THEM MOST*  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY NOT 5. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.47. HOW MANY OF YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICERS USE THEIR RANK IN WAYS THAT SEEM UNNECESSARY TO YOU*  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. SOME OF THEM DO 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.48. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSET*  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
Q.49. DO YOU THINK THAT THE EFFICIENCY RATINGS GIVEN TO OFFICERS ARE USUALLY FAIR OR NOT*  1. USUALLY FAIR 2. USUALLY NOT FAIR 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.50. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS*  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.51. HOW MUCH DOES IT BOTHER YOU WHEN YOU HAVE TO WORK EXTRA TIME ON YOUR REGULAR DUTIES*  1. BOTHERS ME A GREAT DEAL 2. BOTHERS ME QUITE A BIT 3. DOESN,T BOTHER ME MUCH 4. DOESN,T BOTHER ME AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
Q.52. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY*  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT,S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

Q.53. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE IN*  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER

Q.54. IF YOU WERE SENT INTO ACTUAL FIGHTING RIGHT NOW, HOW DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO*  1. I THINK I WOULD DO ALL RIGHT 2. I THINK I WOULD HAVE TROUBLE AT FIRST, BUT AFTER A WHILE I WOULD BE OK 3. I DON,T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 4. I HAVEN,T ANY IDEA HOW I WOULD DO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.55. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO THE FIGHTING*  01. I,M READY TO GO AND I WANT TO GET INTO THE REAL FIGHTING SOON 02. I,D LIKE TO GET IN ON THE FIGHTING BEFORE IT,S OVER, BUT I DON,T THINK I,M READY YET 03. I HOPE I WON,T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I,LL DO ALL RIGHT 04. I HOPE I WON,T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON,T THINK I,LL EVER BE GOOD AS A FIGHTER 05. NO INDICATION OF WHETHER HE WANTS TO GO OR NOT 06. WANTS TO GO BUT DOESN,T WANT TO LEAVE HIS FAMILY 07. WANTS TO GO IF HE CAN GO WITH THE MEN HE TRAINED 08. WOULD LIKE TO GET IN, BUT IN SOME OTHER BRANCH 09. OTHER COMMENTS INDICATING MAN DOES NOT WISH COMBAT 10. ALL OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

Q.56. IF YOU WERE GOING TO BE SENT OVERSEAS WITH A COMBAT UNIT, WOULD YOU RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE GERMANS OR WOULD YOU RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE*  1. I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE GERMANS 2. I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 3. IT WOULD NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

Q.57. IF THE GERMANS WERE TO OFFER TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TO GIVE UP ALL THE COUNTRIES AND TERRITORY THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD DO*  1. WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE OFFER AND STOP FIGHTING NOW 2. WE SHOULD CONSIDER THE OFFER AND TRY TO WORK OUT SOME PEACE TERMS WITH THEM 3. WE SHOULD TURN DOWN THE OFFER AND KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY GIVE UP COMPLETELY 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.58. IF THE JAPANESE WERE TO OFFER TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TO GIVE UP ALL THE COUNTRIES AND TERRITORY THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD DO*  1. WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE OFFER AND STOP FIGHTING NOW 2. WE SHOULD CONSIDER THE OFFER AND TRY TO WORK OUT SOME PEACE TERMS WITH THEM 3. WE SHOULD TURN DOWN THE OFFER AND KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY GIVE UP COMPLETELY 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 59 NOT CODED.
Q.60. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTING*  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.61. WHICH DO YOU THINK ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST, THE GERMANS OR THE JAPANESE*  1. THE GERMANS ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST 2. THE JAPANESE ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST 3. THEY ARE ABOUT THE SAME 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.62. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR SO*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.63. HOW DO YOU THINK WE WILL GET ALONG WITH CHINA AFTER THE WAR*  1. WE WILL GET ALONG VERY WELL 2. WE WILL DISAGREE ABOUT SOME THINGS BUT MANAGE TO GET ALONG 3. WE WILL HAVE SOME SERIOUS DISAGREEMENTS BUT WE WON,T FIGHT EACH OTHER 4. WE WILL VERY LIKELY FIGHT EACH OTHER SOONER OR LATER 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.64. HOW DO YOU THINK WE WILL GET ALONG WITH RUSSIA AFTER THE WAR*  1. WE WILL GET ALONG VERY WELL 2. WE WILL DISAGREE ABOUT SOME THINGS BUT MANAGE TO GET ALONG 3. WE WILL HAVE SOME SERIOUS DISAGREEMENTS BUT WE WON,T FIGHT EACH OTHER 4. WE WILL VERY LIKELY FIGHT EACH OTHER SOONER OR LATER 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.65. HOW DO YOU THINK WE WILL GET ALONG WITH ENGLAND AFTER THE WAR*  1. WE WILL GET ALONG VERY WELL 2. WE WILL DISAGREE ABOUT SOME THINGS BUT MANAGE TO GET ALONG 3. WE WILL HAVE SOME SERIOUS DISAGREEMENTS BUT WE WON,T FIGHT EACH OTHER 4. WE WILL VERY LIKELY FIGHT EACH OTHER SOONER OR LATER 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.66. AFTER THE ALLIES WIN THE WAR, WHAT KIND OF A CHANCE DO YOU THINK THERE IS THAT THE TYPE OF PEACE YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEE WILL BE WORKED OUT IN THE PEACE SETTLEMENT*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.67. DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THE WAR SOLDIERS IN YOUR OUTFIT WILL FIND IT EASIER OR HARDER TO GET JOBS THAN THEY DID BEFORE THE WAR*  1. EASIER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. HARDER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.68. DO YOU THINK THAT THINGS WILL BE BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOU PERSONALLY AFTER THE WAR THAN THEY WERE BEFORE THE WAR*  1. BETTER FOR ME AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. SAME FOR ME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. WORSE FOR ME AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.69. ARE THERE ANY IMPORTANT CHANGES WHICH YOU THINK SHOULD BE MADE IN THE UNITED STATES AFTER THE WAR*  1. YES, A GOOD MANY 2. YES, A FEW 3. NO, NOT ANY 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.70. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK THAT THE CHANGES YOU FAVOR IN THE UNITED STATES ACTUALLY WILL TAKE PLACE*  1. YES, IN FULL 2. YES, IN PART 3. NO 4. UNDECIDED 5. I DON,T FAVOR ANY CHANGES 0. NO ANSWER X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2
